name: Rough Justice
overview: Intergalactic Bounty Hunter and Cyborg "Mansfield Rough", vanished while in a remote part of the galaxy over a month ago, and nothing has been heard of him until now. A message demanding a huge ransom has been received from a mystery alien race, inhabiting a hitherto unexplored planet, DRAGONIA-6809. His niece, "Shipley", a chip off the old block, and having just obtained her pilot's license, decides to head off to teach those nasty aliens a lesson! Navigate Shipley's craft, the INTERCEPTOR 010, throughout cavern after cavern - avoid contact with aliens - blast crates to reveal bounty. Within them, some contain treasure, adding to your score, while others increase firepower). Time your moves to dodge forcefields, and be wary of rockets that launch at you. Your weapons are a laser which will destroy rockets, crates and certain aliens. You also have a bouncing bomb that will annihilate everything in it's path. You have 5 ships to begin with. An extra craft is awarded on completion of each level.
